Immutable Infrastructure

Benefits

  • Infrastructure is consistent and reliable, making testing more straightforward.
  • Each deployment is versioned and automated, enabling easy environment rollback.
  • Errors, configuration drifts, and snowflake servers are mitigated or eliminated entirely.
  • Deployment remains consistent across all environments (dev, test, and prod).
  • Auto-scaling is effortless thanks to cloud services.

Tangible Steps for Adoption

  1. Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Tools.
  2. Implement Rolling Deployments.
  3. Version and Automate Everything.
